definition: sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: Pulsate rate of the heart can be displayed in digital method and monitored.
sentences.chinese: 这种电路可实现心率数字显示和心音放大监听。

sentences.english: ECG and phonocardiogram were recorded by synchronization.
sentences.chinese: 整个检查过程同步记录心电图及心音图。

sentences.english: Listen to the leaping sound of your heart, Harass your skinny body.
sentences.chinese: 听著你跳跃著的心音，抚摸你柔细的身躯。

sentences.english: The application of higher- order statistics to analyzing PCG signal is studied.
sentences.chinese: 对高阶统计量方法应用于心音信号分析进行了研究。

sentences.english: In this paper, we also discussed the development of the heart sound analysis system.
sentences.chinese: 本研究的另一个重要内容是心音分析系统的开发。

sentences.english: Fourth heart sound correlated with damage of left ventricular function and compliance.
sentences.chinese: 第四心音与左室功能损害及室壁的顺应性差有关。

sentences.english: Methods The way that envelope extraction of heart sounds based on key-points was given.
sentences.chinese: 方法基于局部关键点提取心音包络。

definition: Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
Lu Yu (733-804), Chinese writer from Tang dynasty, known for his obsession with tea
